name: Topkapi Palace
teaser: Where sultans dreamed empires into being
shortStory: For 400 years, this palace was the heart of Ottoman power. Within its walls, sultans ruled three continents, treasures from across the world gathered, and the fate of empires was decided in whispered councils.
bullets: The Imperial Treasury holds legendary jewels
Sacred relics of Prophet Muhammad rest here

media.alt: Topkapi Palace courtyard with ornate tiles
